original_title: SJB appoints disciplinary committee on Rajitha
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Samagi Jana Balavegaya has appointed a special disciplinary committee to take disciplinary action on SJB Kalutara District MP Rajitha Senaratne.
An SJB spokesperson said that the decision was reached during a special meeting convened by the Samagi Jana Balavegaya on Monday (10) evening.
He said that this decision was taken based on the repeated statements made by the MP against the position of the party.
